data.event: Due to its strategic importance, there was a Battle of Diu in 1509 between Portugal and a combined force of Turkey, Egypt, Venice, the Republic of Ragusa (now known as Dubrovnik) and the Sultan of Gujarat, Mahmud Begada.
In 1513, the Portuguese tried to establish an outpost there, but negotiations were unsuccessful.

event.title: attempts by Diogo Lopes de Sequeira in 1521

data.event: There were failed attempts by Diogo Lopes de Sequeira in 1521, Nuno da Cunha in 1523.
In 1531 the conquest attempted by D. Nuno da Cunha was also not successful.
